name: Golfinity (itch)
description:
Welcome to Golfinity, the infinite minigolf course!
With each turn you take, the course will grow further away from you! Can you play well enough to keep up? Harder difficulties make the course grow more per turn! 

If you can land your ball in the final segment, you'll pin the course and it won't be able to run away unless you leave or sink the putt! 

Cross your fingers that my flood fill algorithm fails and the course gets trapped! 

=-=-=--=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Controls:

W/S - Increase/decrease shot strength
A/D - Adjust aim
Arrow Keys - Rotate camera
Spacebar - Hit ball (Only on your turn!) 

Stuck? Press ESCAPE and click Give Up to return to the main menu!
=-=-=--=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-

Made for the 2022 Kenney jam
All art assets are from Kenney
All sounds are from freesound.org
